AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Normal Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was not a special one in the culture chamber.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Active Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a little too energetic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Friendly Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] liked to make friends with the foods.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Creative Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] could draw Mona Lisa with digestive juices.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Digging Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] drilled well-organized holes on solid media.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Fast-Growing Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had an insatiable appetite.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Bellicose Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to start a fight.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Nerdy Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated with the history of agriculture.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Shrewd Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] knew how to arm itself at any time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Imitating Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to simulate humans.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Bizarre Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always in a deep meditation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Shopkeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a shopkeeper at a local farm market. [PAWN_nameDef]'s most important shot was hiding under a table while the main character had a gunfight with killing drones from the future.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Killing Drones
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a killing drone from the future. [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to fire barrage at the main characters, but not to hurt them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Kung Fu Masterr
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the main character of a Kung Fu action movie. The new EX movie studio never had substitutes and all the fighting scenes were real, so [PAWN_pronoun] even got killed a couple of times in the production.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Battle Sister
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an assassin. [PAWN_nameDef] always dressed up as a sister and obsessed with using explosives in all the missions

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Kind Scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a scientist of a biotech company that performs unethical human experiments. [PAWN_nameDef]'s most important shot was being suffocated by a security officer after [PAWN_nameDef] released a test subject.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Evil CEO
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a CEO of a biotech company that performs unethical human experiments. [PAWN_nameDef] had a dream of dominating humanity using the latest bio-weapon made by the company, but [PAWN_pronoun] was killed by the creation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Unlucky Surgeon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a surgeon of a expedition group in Antarctica who encounters aliens. [PAWN_nameDef]'s most important shot was being mutilated by a infested team member when [PAWN_nameDef] was performing a dissection.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Line Infantry
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a line infantry in a great war. [PAWN_nameDef]'s most important shot was yelling "Vive l'empereur" and then running away from the battle.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Sergeant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a sergeant in a great war. [PAWN_nameDef] did not had important dialogues or plots, but [PAWN_pronoun] never complained.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Combat Medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as the only sane person of a squad full of freaks. [PAWN_nameDef]'s most important shot was being blasted into pieces to show some cruelty of war in a comedy movie.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Deserter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a deserter of the army. [PAWN_nameDef] was an enthusiastic cook and [PAWN_pronoun] spent most the time in the war as a camper instead of a soldier

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Desperate Miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a miner in a dystopia. [PAWN_nameDef]'s most important shot was being beaten to death by some city guards after [PAWN_pronoun] stole some water and foods

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice City Guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a guard of a city in the desert. [PAWN_nameDef]'s most important job was to arrest refugees and sell them as slaves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Medieval Farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a medieval farmer. [PAWN_nameDef] was very smart because [PAWN_pronoun] figured out a way to tell if someone was a witch.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Medieval Knight
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a medieval knight. [PAWN_nameDef] could not ride horses.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Dead Body
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a dead body in the battlefield. When not being actually killed, [PAWN_pronoun] spent the day in meditation.
